tool_description: API used to retrieve data from Google search results in real time. Support web search and image search
name: Neo Google Search
title: Neo Google Search

api_list.name: Web Search
api_list.description: This endpoint is used for web searches

optional_parameters.name: num
optional_parameters.description:
Number of search results to return.
Valid values are integers between 1 and 200, inclusive

api_list.name: Image Search
api_list.description: This endpoint is used for image searches

optional_parameters.name: gl
optional_parameters.description: The gl parameter value is a two-letter country code. The gl parameter boosts search results whose country of origin matches the parameter value

optional_parameters.name: lr
optional_parameters.description: Restricts the search to documents written in a particular language

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: The index of the first result to return.

optional_parameters.name: num
optional_parameters.description:
Number of search results to return.
Valid values are integers between 1 and 20, inclusive
